info.name: Circular Facebook Profile Images
info.description: Changes all facebook display pictures from squares to circular images.
info.additionalInfo:
/// FAQ /// Why Did You Remove Pictures Returning To Square On Hover? This is only temporary as I have only just recently re-written the entire style. Please be patient. Can I Use Your CSS In My Facebook Style? Absolutely! As long as you abide by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike license. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
/// Changelog /// ### Added - Display pictures return to square on hover. ## [2.0.4] - 2016-07-22 ### Fixed - Nav user display picture is round again. ## [2.0.3] - 2016-04-08 ### Fixed - Nav user display picture is round again. - Left Nav user display picture is round again. - Chat List display pictures are round again. ## [2.0.2] - 2016-04-01 ### Fixed - Trending video background no-longer being rounded. - 'Change Profile Picture' UI bug. ## [2.0.1] - 2016-03-19 ### Added - Ad Panel Page Manager display images are now round. ### Fixed - Video background no-longer being rounded after playback. ## [2.0.0] - 2016-03-05 ### Added - Some UI changes. ### Changed - Completely re-written to be more 'future-proof' and less hostile for other developers. ### Removed - Temporarily removed display pictures returning to square on hover. ## [1.1.1] - 2016-01-19 ### Added - Some UI changes. - Bug fixes. ## [1.1.0] - 2015-03-06 ### Added - Display pictures return to square on hover. ## [1.0.0] - 2015-02-28 ### Added - Changes all facebook display pictures from squares to circular images.
